Speedbreaker looked on in suprise at this. He then heard a radio from 
Megatron. "Meet us at the landing site of the pod" it said. He assumed 
he should take the robot. "Drag Strip, we got buisness to attend to" 
he said walking up towards Symphony.

Megatron looked at the screen with a smile on his face. He had managed 
to maneuver Astroblast through most of the mine without damage to the 
ship. He opened up another comm-link. "Cyclonus, Scourge, meet me at 
the following coordinates". He then set down Astroblast near Wildrider 
and Dead-End.
